events.message: We received the candidate's application for the software engineer position with enthusiasm.
The application has been correctly categorised under Engineering based on the role and keywords in the resume.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering roles was assigned to manage this candidate's application process.
Initial phone screening was conducted successfully, and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of backend development.
The candidate replied promptly, expressing interest and availability for the upcoming technical interview round.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to assess the candidateâ€™s problem-solving and coding skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview with excellent performance, impressing the interviewers with their software architecture knowledge.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and employment terms with the candidate.
The HR interview went smoothly; the candidate aligned well with company values and expectations.
An official offer was proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits tailored to their experience.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer to join as a software engineer starting next month.
The onboarding process was initiated smoothly, with the candidate completing initial orientation and setup.
The hiring process was successfully closed after the candidate fully onboarded into the engineering team.
